column4: The biggest barrier is a lack of consensus on whether SBOMs actually provide value. If your SBOM says authoritatively, "we depend on FooSoft, developed by Kim Bar" but you know nothing about Kim Bar, it is debatable whether you have improved the status quo.
column7: Lack of support for AI/ML-based software
column9: Difficulty to verify that information in SBOMs is accurate
column12: Lack of formal distribution and sharing recommendations
column13: Some are too targeted to more dependency heavy languages.
column15: Lack of support for some programming languages and/or ecosystems
